mapper.select: SELECT i.file_name AS name, '/api/image/files/' || i.file_name AS url, COALESCE(v.count, 0) AS count FROM image i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT file_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM vote GROUP BY file_name ) v ON i.file_name = v.file_name ORDER BY count DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image (qr_code, file_name, file) VALUES (#{qrCode}, #{fileName}, #{file})
